description: Compute Euler totient function for the p(n+1)-p(n)-1 composite numbers between two consecutive primes; choose the largest.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,1000
prog: (PARI) { n=-1; q=3; forprime (p=5, prime(1003), a=0; for (i=q + 1, p - 1, a=max(eulerphi(i), a)); q=p; write("b061108.txt", n++, " ", a) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 18 2009]
author: _Labos Elemer_, May 29 2001
